MCQ: Supervised learning algorithms build a mathematical model of a set of data that contains both the inputs and the desired ___
Choices: a: features | b: labels | c: predictions | d: outputs

MCQ: Classification algorithms are used when the outputs are restricted to a limited set of values, and regression algorithms are used when the outputs may have any ___ value within a range.
Choices: a: numerical | b: categorical | c: discrete | d: continuous
